concept.label: Equestrian sport
concept.definition: Equestrian Sport: A segment within the field of sport that includes all activities conducted with a horse as a partner.

data.label: 1875 Kentucky Derby
data.description: The 1875 Kentucky Derby, designated by the entity Q4555495, was the inaugural running of the Kentucky Derby.
data.rationale: The 1875 Kentucky Derby involves activities conducted with a horse, as it is a horse racing event. According to the definition provided, any activity that includes a horse as a partner falls under the category of Equestrian Sport. Therefore, the 1875 Kentucky Derby can be classified as an Equestrian Sport.
